com.lexicalscope.eventcast
Interface EventCastingExceptionListener

public interface EventCastingExceptionListener

Implement this interface to be notified of exceptions that occur during event casting

Author:
tim

Method Summary
 void exceptionDuringEventCast(Throwable cause, Type listenerType, Object listener, Method listenerMethod, Object[] eventArguments)
          Notified if an exception is thrown my an event listener during event casting
 

Method Detail

exceptionDuringEventCast

void exceptionDuringEventCast(Throwable cause,
                              Type listenerType,
                              Object listener,
                              Method listenerMethod,
                              Object[] eventArguments)
Notified if an exception is thrown my an event listener during event casting

Parameters:
cause - the exception the was thrown
listenerType - the type of listener that threw the exception
listener - the listener that threw the exception
listenerMethod - the method that threw the exception
eventArguments - the message that was being sent to the listener
